page.title: 15Leisure and Recreation
page.content: In my spare time I play tennis,badminton and swimming,but 900 years ago they would not have had much spare time,because of working on the land.Families usually watch television at nights,and most adults do a lot of gardening.There are local swimming baths in nearly every area.Most old people play bingo and a lot of old men play bowls.Young men or teenagers play snooker or pool.For young children there are parks nearby. I like going to the ice rinks and roller rinks because it is exciting.
